oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Isaac D. Stephens] daguerreotype
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Daguerreotype of young uniformed soldier. This is believed to be Pvt. Isaac D. Stephens, 5th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. Stephens was born October 18, 1845, to Jacob Stephens and Levina Smith. He died on November 11, 1916, in Parrottsville, Tenn. and; is buried in the Stephens Cemetery. The image could be a picture of his brother-in-law, Thomas S. Snapp. (See chat001 for Snapp.)
